name: 劉宛育
objective:
本課程以建築設計的相關知識與操作手法之介紹為主，輔以大量的案例說明。

開學週進行課程說明（含課程內容與評量標準）與選課名單確認
有意修習本課程的同學請準時出席

修課期間請加入並開啟本社團通知
https://www.facebook.com/groups/ntutarch155/
schedule:
◆ Notations & Mapping
◆ Diagrams
◆ Construction & Materiality I
◆ Construction & Materiality II
◆ Strategies: Vertical movement
◆ Strategies: Plan arrangement
◆ Strategies: Exterior design I
◆ Strategies: Exterior design II
◆ Parameters I
◆ Parameters II
◆ Learning skills & tools
materials:
Koolhaas, Rem & Mau, Bruce (1995) S,M,L,XL. The Monacelli Press.

Eisenman, Peter (1999) Diagram Diaries, Universe Publishing

Cros, Susanna (2003) The Metapolis Dictionary of Advanced Architecture: City, Technology and Society in the Information Age. ACTAR.

Moussavi, Farshid (2006) The Function of Ornament. ACTAR.

Blanciak, François (2008) Siteless: 1001 Building Forms. The MIT Press.

Moussavi, Farshid (2009) The Function of Form. ACTAR and Harvard Graduate School of Design.

Ingels, Bjarke (2009) Yes Is More: An Archicomic on Architectural Evolution. Evergreen.

Brownell, Blaine (2011) Material Strategies: Innovative Applications in Architecture. Princeton Architectural Press.

Mari & Yoo (2012) Operative Design: A Catalog of Spatial Verbs. BIS Publishers.

Muckenheim & Demel (2012) Inspiration: Contemporary Design Methods in Architecture. BIS Publishers.

Tschumi, Bernard (2012) Architecture Concepts: Red is Not a Color. Rizzoli.

Moussavi, Farshid (2015) The Function of Style. ACTAR.

Simitch & Warke (2014) The Language of Architecture: 26 Principles Every Architect Should Know. Rockport Publishers《建築的語言》


Pierre von Meiss (2014) Elements of Architecture: From Form to Place + Tectonics. Routledge《建築的元素：形式、場所、構築，最恆久的建築體驗、空間觀與設計論》
